ZH: 老翁騎車掉錢男女路人偷撿。台北市一名葉姓老翁二十二日下午，到銀行領低收入戶補助，又跟朋友借了三萬元準備過年，葉姓老翁踩著腳踏車要回家，沒察覺夾克口袋的錢已經掉在馬路上，看到掉錢的一男一女路人，趕緊跑過去撿起地上的鈔票，這時老翁困在車陣等紅燈，撿到錢的男女可以歸還卻沒這麼做，等到綠燈老翁騎走了，口袋的錢又掉出來，見錢眼開的這對男女繼續偷偷撿。
HAN: 老公仔騎車落錢男女過路人偷抾。臺北市一名姓葉老公仔二十二號下晡，到銀行領低收入戶補助，閣佮朋友借了三萬箍準備過年，姓葉老公仔踏著跤踏車欲轉去，無察覺航空衣橐袋仔的錢已經落佇車路頂，看著落錢的一男一女過路人，趕緊走過去抾起塗跤的紙票，這陣老公仔牢佇車陣等紅燈，抾著錢的男女會當歸還煞無按呢做，等到青燈老公仔騎走矣，橐袋仔的錢閣落出來，見錢痟的這對男女繼續偷偷仔抾。
TL: lāu-kong-á khiâ-tshia lak-tsînn lâm-lí kuè-lōo-lâng thau-khioh. tâi-pak-tshī tsi̍t-miâ sènn-ia̍p lāu-kong-á jī-tsa̍p-jī-hō ē-poo，kàu gîn-hâng niá kē-siu-ji̍p-hōo póo-tsōo，koh kap pîng-iú tsioh-liáu sann-bān-khoo tsún-pī kuè-nî，sènn-ia̍p lāu-kong-á ta̍h-tio̍h kha-ta̍h-tshia beh-tńg-khì，bô-tshat-kak hâng-khong-i lak-tē-á ê tsînn í-king lak-tī tshia-lōo-tíng，khuànn-tio̍h lak-tsînn ê tsi̍t-lâm-tsi̍t-lí kuè-lōo-lâng，kuánn-kín tsáu-kuè-khì khioh-khí thôo-kha-ê tsuá-phiò，tsit-tsūn lāu-kong-á tiâu-tī tshia-tīn tán-âng-ting，khioh-tio̍h-tsînn ê lâm-lí ē-tàng kui-huân suah-bô án-ni-tsò，tán-kàu tshenn-ting lāu-kong-á khiâ-tsáu-0ah，lak-tē-á ê tsînn koh-lak-tshut-lâi，kìnn-tsînn-siáu ê tsit-tuì lâm-lí kè-sio̍k thau-thau-á-khioh。
EN: An old man riding a bike dropped money, and passersby picked it up. On the afternoon of the 22nd, a man surnamed Yeh in Taipei went to the bank to collect subsidies for low-income households. He also borrowed 30,000 yuan from a friend to prepare for the Lunar New Year. Yeh rode his bike home and didn't realize that the money in his jacket pocket had fallen onto the road. When a man and a woman passerby saw the money on the ground, they quickly ran over to pick up the cash. At this time, the old man was stuck in traffic waiting for the red light. The man and woman who picked up the money could have returned it, but they didn't. When the light turned green and the old man rode away, the money fell out of his pocket again. The pair of men and women who were greedy for money continued to secretly pick it up.

ZH: 站在左營的舊部落，就好像走進時光隧道，傳統的三合院古厝，錯落在巷弄之間，就像是在走迷宮一樣，趣味的就是，發現古厝的生活蹤影，偶而還會發現古代人的學問，人家說「巷仔內」是內行的，走進巷內就發現了，內行人用原子筆一筆一畫，畫出佛像的畫家陳步雲，就住在「巷仔內」，住在左營舊部落的名人不少，還有一位是歌舞秀場天王豬哥亮，他小時候就在這裡長大的巷弄文化，呈現歷史的軌跡和人文風情。
HAN: 徛佇左營的舊部落，都若像行入時光磅空，傳統的三合院古厝，散插佇巷弄之間，都像是佇行迷宮仝款，趣味的就是，發現古厝的生活影跡，有時仔猶會發現古早人的學問，人講「巷仔內」是內行的，行入巷仔內都發現矣，內行的用原子筆一筆一劃，畫出佛像的畫家陳步雲，都蹛佇「巷仔內」，蹛佇左營舊部落的名人袂少，猶有一位是歌舞場天王豬哥亮，伊細漢時都佇這跡大漢的巷弄文化，呈現歷史的軌跡和人文風情。
TL: khiā-tī tsó-iânn-ê kū-pōo-lo̍k，to-ná-tshiūnn kiânn-ji̍p sî-kong pōng-khang，thuân-thóng-ê sann-ha̍p-īnn kóo-tshù，suánn-tshap-tī hāng-lōng-tsi-kan，to-tshiūnn-sī tī kiânn-bê-kiong kāng-khuán，tshù-bī-ê tio̍h-sī，huat-hiān kóo-tshù-ê sing-ua̍h iánn-tsiah，ū-sî-á iàu-ē huat-hiān kóo-tsá-lâng ê ha̍k-būn，lâng-kóng「hāng-á-lāi」sī lāi-hâng-ê，kiânn-ji̍p hāng-á-lāi to-huat-hiān-0ah，lāi-hâng-ê īng guân-tsú-pit tsi̍t-pit-tsi̍t-ue̍h，uē-tshut hu̍t-siōng-ê uē-ka tân-pōo-hûn，to-tuà-tī「hāng-á-lāi」，tuà-tī tsó-iânn kū-pōo-lo̍k-ê miâ-lâng bē-tsió，iàu-ū tsi̍t-uī sī kua-bú-tiûnn thian-ông ti-ko-liāng，i sè-hàn-sî to-tī tsit-liah tuā-hàn-ê hāng-lōng-bûn-huà，thîng-hiān li̍k-sú-ê kuí-jiah hâm jîn-bûn-hong-tsîng。
EN: Standing in the old tribe of Zuoying is like walking into a time tunnel. Traditional courtyard houses are scattered among the alleys, like walking through a maze. The fun part is discovering the traces of life in the old houses and occasionally discovering the knowledge of ancient people. They say that those who know the place well are familiar with the alleys. Walking into the alleys, you will find that the painter of the Buddha statue, Chen Buyun, who uses a ballpoint pen to draw stroke by stroke, lives in the alleys. There are many celebrities who live in the old tribe of Zuoying, including the king of song and dance, Zhu Geliang, who grew up here. The alley culture presents the historical trajectory and humanistic charm.
POJ: khiā-tī chó-iâⁿ-ê kū-pō͘-lo̍k，to-ná-chhiūⁿ kiâⁿ-ji̍p sî-kong pōng-khang，thoân-thóng-ê saⁿ-ha̍p-īⁿ kó͘-chhù，sóaⁿ-chhap-tī hāng-lōng-chi-kan，to-chhiūⁿ-sī tī kiâⁿ-bê-kiong kāng-khoán，chhù-bī-ê tio̍h-sī，hoat-hiān kó͘-chhù-ê seng-oa̍h iáⁿ-chiah，ū-sî-á iàu-ē hoat-hiān kó͘-chá-lâng ê ha̍k-būn，lâng-kóng「hāng-á-lāi」sī lāi-hâng-ê，kiâⁿ-ji̍p hāng-á-lāi to-hoat-hiān-0ah，lāi-hâng-ê ēng goân-chú-pit chi̍t-pit-chi̍t-oe̍h，ōe-chhut hu̍t-siōng-ê ōe-ka tân-pō͘-hûn，to-tòa-tī「hāng-á-lāi」，tòa-tī chó-iâⁿ kū-pō͘-lo̍k-ê miâ-lâng bē-chió，iàu-ū chi̍t-ūi sī koa-bú-tiûⁿ thian-ông ti-ko-liāng，i sè-hàn-sî to-tī chit-liah tōa-hàn-ê hāng-lōng-bûn-hòa，thêng-hiān le̍k-sú-ê kúi-jiah hâm jîn-bûn-hong-chêng。
